overview: “Choosing Real Immunity” takes a look at the role of consciousness as it relates to health and natural immunity. Hear from Dr Joe Dispenza, Del Bigtree, Tony Jimenez and others who have taken the road less traveled, veered from the conventional path, and embody true healing. Meet medical doctors who trained in traditional schools and then made choices to explore untraditional forms of treatment for their patients.
tagline: Fear is just a prayer for what we don't want.
title: Choosing Real Immunity
